Name: Alien Destroyer
About the game: Alien robots are attacking. The last piece of land is rapidly collapsing. Destroy all enemies and survive. -Dynamic shooter. -Endless ammo. -The piece of land gets smaller over time. -Interesting and unique enemies. -Beautiful 3d graphics. -Reach the last boss, the black king, and destroy him.
